channel.title: Ezekiel on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Ezekiel on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive

item.title: Ezekiel - American Standard-ASV1901 (ASV)
item.description: [1:1] Now it came to pass in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month', in the fifth day’ of the month, as I was among the captives by the river Chebar, that the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God. [1:2] In the fifth `day’ of the month, which was the fifth year of king Jehoiachin’s captivity, [1:3] the word of Jehovah came expressly unto Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans by the river Chebar; and the hand of Jehovah was there upon him.

item.title: Ezekiel - Bible in Basic English (BBE)
item.description: [1:1] Now it came about in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, on the fifth day of the month, while I was by the river Chebar among those who had been made prisoners, that the heavens were made open and I saw visions of God. [1:2] On the fifth day of the month, in the fifth year after King Jehoiachin had been made a prisoner, [1:3] The word of the Lord came to me, Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldaeans by the river Chebar; and the hand of the Lord was on me there.

item.title: Ezekiel - King James Version (KJV)
item.description: [1:1] Now it came to pass in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I was among the captives by the river of Chebar, that the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God. [1:2] In the fifth day of the month, which was the fifth year of king Jehoiachin’s captivity, [1:3] The word of the LORD came expressly unto Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans by the river Chebar; and the hand of the LORD was there upon him.

item.title: Ezekiel - World English Bible (WEB)
item.description: [1:1] Now it happened in the thirtieth year, in the fourth [month], in the fifth [day] of the month, as I was among the captives by the river Chebar, that the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God. [1:2] In the fifth [day] of the month, which was the fifth year of king Jehoiachin’s captivity, [1:3] the word of Yahweh came expressly to Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans by the river Chebar; and the hand of Yahweh was there on him.

item.title: Ezekiel - Young's Literal Translation (YLT)
